text: (are) Microcephalic osteodysplastic primordial dwarfism type 2 ?,"Microcephalic osteodysplastic primordial dwarfism type 2 (MOPD2) is a condition characterized by short stature (dwarfism), skeletal abnormalities and an unusually small head size (microcephaly).
